summary.title: Pancreatic Ductal Adenocarcinoma (PDAC) Proteomics Landscape
summary.abstract: Mass-spectrometry based proteomics analysis of 200 resected PDAC tumor samples compared with adjacent normal tissue. Includes detailed clinical staging and chemotherapy response data.

dataCustodian.name: Pancreatic Cancer Research Fund Tissue Bank

documentation.description: Mass-spectrometry based proteomics analysis of 200 resected PDAC tumor samples compared with adjacent normal tissue. Includes detailed clinical staging and chemotherapy response data. This is a dummy description generated for testing purposes.

project.projectName: The PAN-PRO Landscape: Proteomic Mapping of Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
project.projectScope: Comprehensive mass spectrometry-based proteomic profiles from PDAC tumor tissues and matched adjacent normal controls.
